title: The declaration and engagement of the Marquesse of Huntley, the Earle of Atholl, Generall Midletou [sic], and many of the nobility of Scotland that have lately taken up arms for the defence of his Maiesties person and just authority.
author: Huntley, Lewis Gordon, Marquess of, d. 1653.
publisher: Printed by Samuell Broun English bookseller,
